oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Parks; Exhibitions; Anniversaries; Commemorations; Exhibition buildings; Columns; Construction; Buildings; Architectural elements; Lakes & ponds
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Centennial Park, showing the construction process and a general view of Lake Watauga and Lily Lake. The Auditorium, Parthenon, Flagstaff, Administration Building, Commerce Building, and Transportation Building are pictured. Scaffolding is erected outside the main entrance to the Transportation Building.
The Tennessee Centennial Exposition was held in Nashville in 1897 to celebrate Tennessee's 100th anniversary of statehood.
